title: MySQLPI()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MySQLPI()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Return the value of PI:
SELECT PI();

Definition and Usage
The PI() function returns the value of PI.
Note:
See also the
DEGREES()
and
RADIANS()
functions.
Syntax
PI()
Technical Details
Works in:
From MySQL 4.0

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers MySQLPI()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use MySQLPI()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of MySQLPI()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
